subject: junit4: removeTestListener
msgSnippet: Does org.junit.runner.Runner need a removeListener to go along with addListener and getListeners methods? This could be useful when starting with an existing
messageBody:
Does org.junit.runner.Runner need a removeListener to go along with
addListener and getListeners methods? This could be useful when starting
with an existing test runner that installs a listener you then want to
remove.


--
